Class BehaviourTree<TAgent>

The class to derive from to create a Behaviour Tree. It is a MonoBehaviour.

Inheritance
System.Object
BehaviourTreeBase
BehaviourTree<TAgent>
PatrollerBT
Namespace: ESGI.BehaviourTrees
Assembly: cs.temp.dll.dll
Syntax
public abstract class BehaviourTree<TAgent> : BehaviourTreeBase where TAgent : MonoBehaviour
Type Parameters
Name Description
TAgent

The type of the agent being controlled by the tree (Boss, Enemy etc.)

Properties

Agent

A reference to the MonoBehaviour being controlled by this BT.

Declaration
public TAgent Agent { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
TAgent

Methods

Awake()

Checks if the Agent is null, if not tries to get it. If still null, logs an error.

Declaration
protected sealed override void Awake()
Overrides
BehaviourTreeBase.Awake()

OnDrawGizmos()

Draws each node's Gizmos (only in Editor).

Declaration
protected sealed override void OnDrawGizmos()
Overrides
BehaviourTreeBase.OnDrawGizmos()

Start()

Starts the tree

Declaration
protected sealed override void Start()
Overrides
BehaviourTreeBase.Start()

Update()

Ticks the nodes. The tree resets if the node is the last one to be ticked.

Declaration
protected sealed override void Update()
Overrides
BehaviourTreeBase.Update()
